segments.text: Looking at the sink, I feel a wave of disbelief wash over me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can the woman be so completely focused on that plate?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s water spilling everywhere, and yet she seems completely unfazed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The chaos created by the children is both hilarious and alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy's concentration as he reaches for the cookies, balancing atop that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s as if he’s in his own world, oblivious to the dangers surrounding him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's eager expression, waiting for her cookie, is almost cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the thought of them both tumbling to the ground makes my stomach churn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen feels so calm, yet there’s an undercurrent of tension that’s hard to ignore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but wonder what will happen if someone finally realizes.
segments.speaker: PAR
